20 def patched_get_param_missing(key, def_val):
21  if key == TestTriggerMonitor.missing_key:
22  return def_val
23  else:
24  return patched_get_param(key, def_val)
25 
26 def patched_get_param(key, def_val):
27  if def_val == None:
28  if key == "/ns/conditions":
29  return "{}"
30  else:
31  return '{0}:{1}'.format(key, def_val)
32  else:
33  return def_val

46  ## Tests if the parameters have the right default value
47  def testDefaults(self):
48  tm = TriggerMonitor()
49  assert tm.node_id == "BBTM"
50  assert tm.conditions == None
51  assert tm.exporting == False
52  assert tm.prev_values == {}
53  assert tm.prev_change == {}

55  ## Tests if the formatted log messages are emitted
56  @patch('src.ros_node_base.RosNodeBase._formatted_log')
57  def testFormattedLog(self, formatted_log):
58  tm = TriggerMonitor()
59  tm.formatted_log('i', 'test')
60  formatted_log.assert_called_once()
61  formatted_log.assert_called_with(tm, 'i', 'test', 'BBTM')
62  formatted_log.reset_mock()
63  tm.formatted_log('w', 'test2')
64  formatted_log.assert_called_once()
65  formatted_log.assert_called_with(tm, 'w', 'test2', 'BBTM')
66  formatted_log.reset_mock()
67  tm.formatted_log('e', 'test3')
68  formatted_log.assert_called_once()
69  formatted_log.assert_called_with(tm, 'e', 'test3', 'BBTM')

140  ## Tests if a new prev change is added
141  @patch('rospy.get_param', side_effect=patched_get_param)
142  @patch('src.ros_node_base.RosNodeBase._ns', side_effect=patched_ns)
143  def testNoPrevChange(self, get_param, ns):
144  tm = TriggerMonitor()
145  tm.load_config()
146  assert tm.exporting == False
147  assert tm.on_change_only == False
148 
149  tm.variable_changed("test", "var1")
150  tm.variable_changed("test", "var2")
151  assert tm.prev_values["var1"] == "test"
152  assert tm.prev_values["var2"] == "test"
153  assert tm.prev_change["var1"] != None
154  assert tm.prev_change["var2"] != None
155  assert len(tm.prev_values.items()) == 2
156 
157  ## Tests if a new prev change is not added if already exporting, but prev value is
158  @patch('rospy.get_param', side_effect=patched_get_param)
159  @patch('src.ros_node_base.RosNodeBase._ns', side_effect=patched_ns)
160  def testNoPrevChange(self, get_param, ns):
161  tm = TriggerMonitor()
162  tm.load_config()
163  tm.exporting = True
164  tm.variable_changed("test", "var1")
165  assert tm.prev_values["var1"] == "test"
166  assert "var1" not in tm.prev_change
167  assert len(tm.prev_values.items()) == 1
168 
169  ## Tests if the change_only mode filters receiving the same value reject the change
170  @patch('rospy.get_param', side_effect=patched_get_param)
171  @patch('src.ros_node_base.RosNodeBase._ns', side_effect=patched_ns)
172  def testNoPrevChange(self, get_param, ns):
173  tm = TriggerMonitor()
174  tm.load_config()
175  tm.on_change_only = True
176  tm.trigger_delay = 0
177 
178  tm.variable_changed("test", "var1")
179  tm.variable_changed("test", "var2")
180 
181  t1 = tm.prev_change["var1"]
182  t2 = tm.prev_change["var2"]
183 
184  tm.variable_changed("test2", "var1")
185  tm.variable_changed("test", "var2")
186 
187  assert tm.prev_values["var1"] == "test2"
188  assert tm.prev_values["var2"] == "test"
189  assert tm.prev_change["var2"] == t2
190  assert tm.prev_change["var1"] != t1
191 
192  ## Tests if the trigger delay works
193  @patch('rospy.get_param', side_effect=patched_get_param)
194  @patch('src.ros_node_base.RosNodeBase._ns', side_effect=patched_ns)
195  def testTriggerDelayLess(self, get_param, ns):
196  tm = TriggerMonitor()
197  tm.load_config()
198  tm.on_change_only = True
199  tm.trigger_delay = 100
200 
201  tm.variable_changed("test", "var1")
202  t1 = tm.prev_change["var1"]
203  tm.variable_changed("test2", "var1")
204 
205  assert tm.prev_values["var1"] == "test2"
206  assert tm.prev_change["var1"] == t1
207 
208  ## Tests if the trigger delay works if the delay is smaller
209  @patch('rospy.get_param', side_effect=patched_get_param)
210  @patch('src.ros_node_base.RosNodeBase._ns', side_effect=patched_ns)
211  def testTriggerDelayMore(self, get_param, ns):
212  tm = TriggerMonitor()
213  tm.load_config()
214  tm.on_change_only = True
215  tm.trigger_delay = 100
216 
217  tm.variable_changed("test", "var1")
218  t1 = tm.prev_change["var1"]
219  time.sleep(0.1)
220  tm.variable_changed("test2", "var1")
221 
222  assert tm.prev_values["var1"] == "test2"
223  assert tm.prev_change["var1"] != t1

225  ## Tests if the correct conditions trigger an export
226  @patch('rospy.get_param', side_effect=patched_get_param)
227  @patch('src.ros_node_base.RosNodeBase._ns', side_effect=patched_ns)
228  @patch('src.trigger_monitor.TriggerMonitor.export')
229  def testConditionTrue(self, export, ns, get_param):
230  tm = TriggerMonitor()
231  tm.load_config()
232  tm.conditions["var1"] = "data > 2 and data < 5"
233  tm.trigger_delay = 0
234 
235  for i in range(6):
236  tm.variable_changed(i, "var1")
237 
238  assert export.call_count == 2
239  assert tm.exporting == False

242  ## Tests if the wrong syntax is handled

245  @patch('src.trigger_monitor.TriggerMonitor.formatted_log')

322  @patch('src.trigger_monitor.TriggerMonitor.load_config')
323  @patch('rospy.spin')

327  @patch('rospy.Publisher.__init__', return_value = None)
328  def testStart(self, publisher_init, thread_start, thread_init, wait_for_service, spin, load_config):
329  tm = TriggerMonitor()
330  tm.conditions = {}
331  tm.conditions["var1"] = ""
332  tm.conditions["var2"] = ""
333  tm.start()
